entry.title: OCB Unbleached Biodegradable Filters – Slim – 10 Packs x 120 Pieces
entry.summary:
Vendor: OCB
Type: Filter
Price: 29.07

Size: Extra Slim
Diameter: 6 mm
Pack: 120 Pieces
Box: 10 Packs

These slim unbleached biodegradable filters from OCB are pre-cut and packaged in a resealable bag. They’re ideal for smokers who value both convenience and quality. They filter out tar and other harsh chemicals while enhancing taste and allowing for airflow.

  • Slim 6 mm size
  • Ready to use pre-cut filters
  • Unbleached and biodrgradable
  • Convenient resealable bag
  • For handrolls or machines
  • Made in France

The iconic hologram logo says it all. With over 100 years of history, OCB has been producing premium rolling accessories for generations. Today, their top-quality smoking products can be found in stores across the globe and are enjoyed by smokers with a taste for the finer things.

entry.title: Mooselabs MouthPeace Filter Roll – 10PC
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mooselabs
Type: Filter
Price: 54.99

Keep your MouthPeace hitting fresh with these official replacement filters from Mooselabs! They remove the bad so you can feel better inhaling the good.

  • Triple-Layer Design
  • Activated Carbon Filtration
  • Biodegradable
  • Made from Recycled Materials
  • Filters Toxins
  • Enhances Taste
  • No-Touch Filter Eject
  • For Use with the Mooselabs MouthPeace

Did you know? Hemp smoke can deposit tar deep into the lungs because of how it’s inhaled.

After 16 months of R&D, the team at Mooselabs has created thir MouthPeace and MouthPeace Filters to address this problem. Made from biodegradable and recycled materials, the triple-layer activated carbon filters will sanitize smoke/vapor and enhance flavors by removing resins, toxins, and tar; all without blocking your intake or reducing airflow.

Using the no-touch design, eject the Filter by pushing it up and out with your thumb from the side of the MouthPeace. Replace as needed for optimal performance. 

See and feel the difference with the MouthPeace personal filter from Mooselabs!

entry.title: Smojo Permanent Smoking Screens 3-pk, 24/box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution Canada
Type: Pipe Accessory
Price: 174.90

Tired of constantly having to buy new screens? Why not try the world’s first permanent smoking screen! Smojo screens are made from top-quality, surgical grade stainless steel and cannot be burned by a standard lighter. They are designed to fit into single-hole glass bowls and pipes, and with proper care, will last for a very long time. They won’t permanently clog and won’t drop out of your piece!

If you want the smoke to flow, you own it to yourself to try Smojo!

 

  • Made in USA
  • Surgical Grade Stainless Steel
  • Designed for Glass Bowls/Pipes
  • Available in 3-Packs, Box of 24

entry.title: Raw-Prerolled filter tips-200/Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw
Type: Filter
Price: 5.90

Compliment your perfect rolls with these top-quality Pure Cotton Filters from RAW, available in regular size with an 8 mm diameter.

  • Regular size
  • 8mm diameter
  • Resealable bag
  • 200 count
  • Chlorine-free
  • Compatible with all standard rolling machines

The rolling masters at RAW have gone old school with these Pure Cotton Filters. Cigarette filters were originally made using cotton, but this was later replaced by acetate tow.  RAW’s decision to use natural unrefined cotton in their filters is a win for smoking purists everywhere!

 Each package of Raw Pure Cotton filters contains 200 cotton filters.  Keep in mind that these filters are a bit harder to pull on account of their stronger draw strength of these filters is a bit stronger. This is normal and is part of the pure RAW experience!

entry.title: Philter Labs POCKET – Personal Smoke Filter – [Blue/Black/Grey]
entry.summary:
Vendor: Philter Labs
Type: Filter
Price: 11.11

Great things come in small packages, and the POCKET Personal Smoke Filter by Philter Labs is no exception. Housed inside its slim, compact design is a patented micro-filtration process that captures particulates, reduces emissions, and diminishes odor. In other words, it’s like your own, personal carbon capture device!

As its name suggests, the POCKET is designed with convenience in mind. It features an easy to wash, removable silicone sleeve and mouthpiece that fit snugly around the filter. Small enough to fit in jeans, a shirt, or a small bag, the POCKET is perfect for smokers on the go. It works with both smoke and vapor, and each one is good for up to 150 exhales before the filter needs replacing.

Whether you’re looking to go stealth mode with your smoke smell or vape incognito, the POCKET by Philter Labs will serve you well. Enhance your smoking experience with greater discretion and cleaner air. Available in Blue, Black, or Grey.

 

Product dimensions: L 0.5” x W 0.5” x H 4”

entry.title: Glass Daisy Screens, 12 / Container
entry.summary:
Vendor: RGR Canada Inc.
Type: Pipe Accessory
Price: 3.99

A glass screen is handy for a multitude of reasons. This Daisy screen comes in a tin of 12. Daisy screens are typically dainty and perfect for small openings.

A screen isn’t necessary to use your glass bong or pipe, but it is preferred by most people. When using a pipe, a screen helps reduce the amount of ash you end up inhaling. If a bong is more your style, a screen will keep your bong and stem much cleaner. This also cuts down on cleaning time, not to mention the amount of 99% alcohol you’re going through.

Over time mesh screens develop holes and get covered with resin, and end up tasting gross too. Glass screens offer a cleaner, healthier alternative. They don’t produce that metallic flavour you sometimes get from brass or stainless steel.

A glass screen is removable and reusable, as long as you don’t lose or break them they can last forever.

To use: Insert the long end of the screen into the small hole in the bowl of your bong or pipe. Next, pack your herbs loosely on top. Now, enjoy! Make sure you remove your screen on a regular basis to keep it clean and maintain optimal effects. It’s easily cleaned with 99% alcohol.
